resources.string: Crystal is an app that runs on top of Samsung Internet to filter ads while you use that browser. For Crystal to be effective, you need Samsung Internet 4.0 or above installed on your device.\nYou can get Samsung Internet browser by tapping on the button below.
Browse worry-free with Crystal protecting you in the background
Block more ads by optimizing Crystal for the languages you typically browse in
Enable Crystal in Samsung Internet\'s Adblocker Settings
Block more ads by optimizing Crystal for the language(s) you typically browse in
Anonymized data helps us improve Crystal, thus creating a better browsing experience for you.
Thatâ€™s it You are ready to use Crystal for Samsung Internet to its fullest
